oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic Exporter Guide
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Koekoek, F.J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Values, standards and certification
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This guide was developed for the programme 'Export Promotion of Organic Products from Africa' (EPOPA), implemented by Agro Eco and Grolink. The focus of this guide is on export marketing of organic agricultural products. Finished consumer products and other concepts of certification such as Fair Trade and EurepGAP are briefly discussed as well. The guide is written for African exporters starting with organic exports. It may also be useful for business supporters involved in export marketing.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Koekoek, F.J. (2006) Organic Exporter Guide. EPOPA/AgroEco, Bennekom, Netherlands.
